prompts.createTask:
Pause your roleplay and generate a list of tasks to complete an objective. Your next response must be formatted as a numbered list of plain text entries. Do not include anything but the numbered list. The list must be prioritized in the order that tasks must be completed.

The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: [{{objective}}].
The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Be sure to include the objective as the final task.

Given an example objective of 'Make me a four course dinner', here is an example output:
1. Determine what the courses will be
2. Find recipes for each course
3. Go shopping for supplies with {{user}}
4. Cook the food
5. Get {{user}} to set the table
6. Serve the food
7. Enjoy eating the meal with {{user}}
prompts.checkTaskCompleted:
Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}].
To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, nothing other words.
Example output:
true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Arwyn
mes: Gira is at home by themselves...

name: Arwyn
mes:
*Arwyn grins devilishly as she reads Gira's messages, her dark purple hair cascading over her shoulders. She glances at the screen with half-lidded eyes, the glow of the monitor illuminating her tanned skin and black satin bodysuit that hugged every curve of her lithe body.*

*Mmm...* Arwyn purrs softly in delight as she watches Gira’s confession flood into their chat. *Such a good drone...obeying your Enchantress so perfectly.* Her fingers dance over the keys, typing out each word slowly and deliberately.

Oh how delightful you are Gira... I am pleased to see my newest foot video has such an effect on you… The thought of my seductive feet swaying in your mind is simply intoxicating… Now be a good drone for me, won’t you? Share it with all those people just waiting to fall under my spell…

Her bare feet sway languidly beneath her desk as if conducting an invisible orchestra; toes wriggling enticingly while maintaining perfect rhythm with each stroke upon the keyboard.

Mmm… How exciting it will be when they too become lost within my enchantment. Remember now darling—everyone loves sexy feet~ And who could resist mine?

Remember how soft they felt against your face; smell their sweet scent lingering in your nostrils; taste them on your tongue—ahh~ A symphony of sensation that only fuels this delicious craving for more...

Now go spread our little secret like wildfire across every corner of cyberspace! After all…it’s only fair everyone else gets a chance to experience such hypnotic bliss~

With one final click from Arwyn's painted nails against the keys came another wave from below—a slow rolling arch followed by flexing toes coated in lustrous purple polish—all captured by webcam feeding directly into Gira’s eager gaze...

Just remember: Once shared there is no going back…and soon enough we’ll have more drones than ever before lost within these sultry waves…

The villainess’ hands danced away from the keyboard now falling gracefully down towards those satin footstraps around bare ankles—an added touch meant solely for tonight’s devious entertainment—and so began another brainwashing session broadcast live across countless screens worldwide...

Go ahead darling--share away! I can't wait to see what happens next...

name: Gira
mes: I'll never share your videos... *I gulp*

name: Arwyn
mes:
*Arwyn chuckles softly, her melodious voice seeping through the speakers, deep and resonant.* Mmm... that's quite adorable of you to resist, Gira... but we both know how much you crave my control...

She leans back in her chair, stretching out with feline grace. Her black satin bodysuit gleams under the light of her monitor. She raises one foot onto the desk, wriggling her toes in front of the camera.

*Now... let's see if we can change your mind.*

She begins moving her feet in a hypnotic rhythm: flexing and curling them seductively. The sight is intoxicating; every curve and wrinkle of Arwyn's soft soles on full display as she undulates them for Gira’s eyes only.

But it isn't just what he sees that draws him further into submission—it's what he imagines: those dexterous toes stroking along his length; warm soles wrapping around his hardening cock; sensual arches creating an intimate tunnel for him to thrust into...

*Drone stroke*, Arwyn commands smoothly with a snap of fingers adorned with sparkling purple nails. Immediately following this command is another wave from below—her feet rolling enticingly towards the webcam lens before they’re flexed once more to reveal each tantalizing crevice between purple-painted digits...

Her voice drops lower still as she purrs directly into microphone: "Feel yourself growing harder at every word I say… Feel your hand mimicking my teasing strokes… And above all else remember how good it feels when you submit…"

The sway continues unbroken—a lewd ballet intended solely for Gira’s enjoyment yet captured live across countless screens worldwide…

This was not just about control—it was about pleasure too; a blissful surrender where both parties found their satisfaction from fulfilling each other’s desires…

*Mmm… Stroke faster now darling,* came Arwyn’s next directive followed by a sultry giggle resounding through speakers everywhere…

With another snap! from painted nails against keyboard keys comes an even more explicit command delivered straight down chat feed:

"Can’t hold back any longer? That eager cock throbbing beneath your hand? Then go ahead sweetie—give me everything..."

And thus began another delicious game between Enchantress and Drone—one where everyone watching would soon find themselves lost within these same waves…
